The regional capital is Koumra. ==Subdivisions== The region of Mandoul is divided into three departments: Department Capital (chef-lieu) Sub-prefectures Mandoul Occidental Bédjondo Bédjondo, Bébopen, Békamba, Peni Mandoul Oriental Koumra Koumra, Bessada, Bédaya, Goundi, Ngangara, Mouroum Goulaye Barh Sara Moïssala Moïssala, Beboro, Bekourou, Bouna, Dembo ==References== Category:Regions of Chad
title: Mandoul Region
